# Next.js Landing Page - Courmayeur Hospitality Services

## Project Overview
Premium landing page for hospitality services in Courmayeur featuring:
- Private driver services
- Local tour guide
- Mountain aperitifs

## Tech Stack
- Next.js (App Router)
- Tailwind CSS
- Framer Motion

## Design Guidelines
- Color palette: snow white, stone gray, forest green, wood beige, soft gold
- Fonts: Playfair Display (titles), Inter (body text)
- Responsive, fluid layout
- Smooth scrolling between sections
